name: lllang-plugins
description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for document handling, design tools, development utilities, and workflow automation

plugins.name: cc-ext
plugins.description: Slash commands and agents for workflow automation - Linear integration, git workflows, and planning

plugins.name: office
plugins.description: Microsoft Office document handling - create, edit, and analyze Word (docx), Excel (xlsx), and PowerPoint (pptx) files

plugins.name: pdf
plugins.description: PDF processing toolkit - extract text/tables, create PDFs, merge/split documents, and fill forms

plugins.name: mineru
plugins.description: Parse PDFs into Markdown and structured outputs using MinerU - extract tables, images, and equations

plugins.name: design
plugins.description: Visual design toolkit - canvas art, algorithmic art, frontend design, TUI design, themes, brand guidelines, and GIF creation

plugins.name: web
plugins.description: Web development tools - build React/Tailwind artifacts and test web applications with Playwright

plugins.name: dev-tools
plugins.description: Developer tools - skill creation, Python testing, and MCP server building

plugins.name: pixi
plugins.description: Pixi package and environment management - conda/pypi dependencies, tasks, environments, and workspace configuration

plugins.name: data
plugins.description: Data engineering tools - production data pipelines and Delta Lake operations

plugins.name: cadquery
plugins.description: Parametric 3D CAD modeling with CadQuery - create models and export to STL/STEP/DXF

plugins.name: comms
plugins.description: Communication and documentation - co-authoring workflows and internal communications templates

plugins.name: coding-agent
plugins.description: Guide for building coding agents from scratch - tool-calling LLM loops and inference architecture

plugins.name: atomic-agents
plugins.description: Design and implement projects with Atomic Agents framework - strongly-typed agents and orchestration

plugins.name: manim
plugins.description: Manim Community - mathematical animation library for creating explanatory videos

plugins.name: ralph
plugins.description: Ralph automation scripts for continuous implementation loops - planning, implementation, and general prompts for autonomous coding workflows

plugins.name: rattler
plugins.description: Rattler-build conda package builder - create, test, and publish conda packages from recipe.yaml files

plugins.name: codebase-docs
plugins.description: Standards and best practices for writing AGENTS.md and specification documents

plugins.name: beautiful-prose
plugins.description: A hard-edged writing style contract for timeless, forceful English prose without modern AI tics

plugins.name: brainstorming
plugins.description: Turn ideas into fully formed designs through collaborative dialogue before implementation

plugins.name: skill-authoring
plugins.description: TDD-based approach to creating and testing Claude Code skills

plugins.name: tauri-driver-cli
plugins.description: Visual testing CLI for Tauri apps - screenshots, DOM snapshots, click/type interactions, and UI verification
